paragraphs.original: 话说贾琏、贾珍、贾蓉等三人商议，事事妥贴，至初二日，先将尤老娘和三姐儿送入新房。尤老娘看了一看，虽不似贾蓉口内之言，倒也十分齐备，母女二人，已算称了心愿。鲍二两口子见了，如一盆火儿，赶著尤老娘一口一声叫“老娘”，又或是“老太太”；赶著三姐儿叫“三姨儿”，或是“姨娘”。至次日五更天，一乘素轿，将二姐儿抬来，各色香烛纸马并铺盖，以及酒饭，早已预备得十分妥当。一时，贾琏素服坐了小轿来了，拜过了天地，焚了纸马，－－那尤老娘见了二姐儿身上头上，焕然一新，不似在家模样，十分得意－－搀入洞房。是夜贾琏和他颠鸾倒凤，百般恩爱，不消细说。
paragraphs.english: Jia Lian, Jia Zhen, and Jia Rong discussed the matter and agreed that the second day of the second lunar month, they would send You Old Mother and the three sisters into the new house. When You Old Mother saw it, she thought it was not as good as what Jia Rong had said, but it was already quite sufficient. Mother and daughter were very satisfied. Bao Er and his wife were very enthusiastic when they saw You Old Mother, calling her "Old Mother" or "Grandmother", and calling the three sisters "Third Sister" or "Sister". The next morning, Jia Lian came in a sedan chair, dressed in mourning clothes, and performed the ceremony, burned paper horses, and You Old Mother was very happy to see Er'er's body and head completely new. She took her into the bridal chamber. That night, Jia Lian and Er'er enjoyed each other's love, and the details are not described.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾琏、贾珍、贾蓉等人商量妥当后，初二日，将尤老娘和三姐儿送入新房。尤老娘一看，觉得虽然不像贾蓉说的那么好，但已经很齐备了，母女二人非常满意。鲍二两口子见到尤老娘，像火一样热情，一口一个“老娘”或“老太太”，对三姐儿则叫“三姨儿”或“姨娘”。第二天早上，贾琏穿着素服坐小轿来了，拜过天地，烧了纸马，尤老娘见二姐儿身上头上焕然一新，非常高兴，将她搀入洞房。当晚，贾琏和二姐儿尽享恩爱，不再细说。

paragraphs.original: 那贾琏越看越爱，越瞧越喜，不知要怎么奉承这二姐儿才过得去，乃命鲍二等人不许提三说二，直以“奶奶”称之，自己也称“奶奶”，竟将凤姐一笔勾倒。有时回家，只说在东府有事。凤姐因知他和贾珍好，有事相商，也不疑心。家下人虽多，都也不管这些事。便有那游手好闲专打听小事的人，也都去奉承贾琏，乘机讨些便宜，谁肯去露风？
paragraphs.english: Jialin looked at her more and more, and didn't know how to flatter her. So he ordered Bao Er and the others not to mention anything about it, and directly called her "madam", and called himself "madam", and forgot about Xing. Sometimes, when he went home, he said he had something to do in the Eastern Mansion. Xing knew that he and Jia Zhen were good friends, and had something to discuss, and didn't suspect it. There were many servants in the family, but none of them were involved in these matters. Those idle people would flatter Jialin and take advantage of the opportunity to get some benefits, who would leak the news?
paragraphs.chinese: 贾琏越看越喜欢，越看越喜欢，不知道该怎么奉承二姐儿。于是命令鲍二等人不要提三说二，直接称“奶奶”，自己也称“奶奶”，把凤姐抛在脑后。有时回家，只说在东府有事。凤姐知道他和贾珍好，有事商量，也不怀疑。家里的仆人很多，但都不管这些事。那些游手好闲的人，都会奉承贾琏，趁机讨些便宜，谁会去泄露风声？

paragraphs.original: 于是贾琏深感贾珍不尽。贾琏一月出十五两银子，做天天的供给。若不来时，他母女三人一处吃饭；若贾琏来，他夫妻二人一处吃，他母女就回房自吃。贾琏又将自己积年所有的体己，一并搬来给二姐儿收著；又将凤姐儿素日之为人行事，枕边衾里，尽情告诉了他。只等一死，便接他进去。二姐儿听了，自然是愿意的了。当下十来个人，倒也过起日子来，十分丰足。
paragraphs.english: So Jialin felt that Jiazhen didn't care for him enough. Jialin was to give fifteen taels of silver each month for the household expenses. When he was not at home, he and his daughter would eat together; when he returned, he and his wife would eat together, and his daughter would eat alone in her room. Jialin brought all his accumulated wealth to be managed by Erqier and told her about Feng's ways of dealing with things. All he had to do was wait for Jialin's death, and then he would take Erqier in. Erqier listened and was naturally pleased. There were ten or so people living together, and they lived very well.
paragraphs.chinese: 于是贾琏觉得贾珍不够关心他。贾琏每个月出十五两银子，用来供给家里的开支。如果贾琏不在家，他和他女儿一起吃饭；如果贾琏回来，他就和妻子一起吃饭，他女儿就回房间自己吃。贾琏把多年积攒的财物搬来给二姐儿保管，并将凤姐儿的为人处事方式告诉了她。只等贾琏一死，他就会接二姐儿进去。二姐儿听了，自然是愿意的。当下有十来个人，过起日子来，十分丰足。

paragraphs.original: 眼见已是两月光景，这日，贾珍在铁槛寺做完佛事，晚间回家时，与他姊妹久别，竟要去探望探望。先命小厮去打听贾琏在与不在，小厮回来，说：“不在那里。”贾珍喜欢，将家人一概先遣回去，只留两个心腹小童牵马。一时，到了新房子里，已是掌灯时候，悄悄进去。两个小厮将马拴在园内，自往下房去听候。
paragraphs.english: Two months have passed in a flash, and on this evening, after completing his temple ceremonies, Jia Jin returned home and wanted to visit his sisters. He sent a messenger to inquire if Jia Lian was at home, and the messenger returned to tell him that he was not. Jia Jin was delighted and left his attendants to wait in the stables, only taking two trusted servants with him. They arrived at the new house, which was already dark, and quietly entered. The two servants tied up the horses in the yard and went to the back room to wait.
paragraphs.chinese: 转眼两个月过去了，这天晚上，贾珍做完寺庙里的佛事，回到家后，想探望自己的姐妹，于是派人去问贾琏是否在家，仆人回来告诉他不在家。贾珍高兴地让家人先回去，只留下两个心腹小童照顾马匹。不久，他们来到了新房子里，已经是掌灯时分，他们悄悄地进去。两个仆人将马拴在院子里，然后去下房等待。

paragraphs.original: 贾珍进来，屋里才点灯，先看过尤氏母女，然后二姐儿出来相见。贾珍见了二姐儿，满面的笑容，一面吃茶，一面笑说：“我做的保山如何？要错过了，打著灯笼还没处寻！过日，你姐姐还备礼来瞧你们呢。”
paragraphs.english: Jia Zhen walked in, and the room was just lit. He first visited Yousheng's mother and daughter, and then Er Ge came out to greet him. When Jia Zhen saw Er Ge, he smiled broadly, sipping tea and jokingly saying, "I've done a good job of being a mountain guard, haven't I? If you missed it, you wouldn't find it even if you lit a lantern! In a few days, your sister will come to visit you with a gift."
paragraphs.chinese: 贾珍走进来，屋里才点上灯，先看了尤氏母女，然后二姐出来相见。贾珍见到二姐，满脸笑容，一边吃茶，一边笑着说：“我做的保山如何？要是错过了，打灯笼也没处找！过几天，你姐姐还会备礼来看你们呢。”

paragraphs.original: 说话之间，二姐儿已命人预备下酒馔。关起门来，都是一家人，原无避讳。那鲍二来请安，贾珍便说：“你还是个有良心的，所以二爷叫你来伏侍。日后自有大用你之处，不可在外头吃酒生事，我自然赏你。倘或这里短了什么，你二爷事多，那里人杂，你只管去回我。我们弟兄，不比别人。”鲍二答应道：“小的知道。若小的不尽心，除非不要这脑袋了。”贾珍笑著点头道：“要你知道就好。”
paragraphs.english: In the meantime, Erniang had already instructed people to prepare a banquet. Since it was all family, there was no need to avoid anything. Bao Er came to pay his respects, and Jia Zhen said, "You're a loyal person, so the second son asked you to come and serve. In the future, there will be places where we can use you. Don't drink or cause trouble outside, and I will reward you. If there is anything missing, the second son is busy and there are many people around, you can just go and tell me. We are brothers, so we are different."
paragraphs.chinese:
说话之间，二姐儿已经吩咐人准备下酒席。关起门来，都是一家人，没有必要避讳。鲍二前来请安，贾珍就说：“你还是个有良心的，所以二爷叫你来伺候。日后自然有用你的地方，不可在外头喝酒闹事，我自然会赏你。倘若这里缺了什么，你二爷事务繁忙，人又杂，你只管去告诉我。我们弟兄，不一样。”

paragraphs.original: 当下四人一处吃酒。二姐儿此时恐怕贾琏一时走来，彼此不雅，吃了两锺酒便推故往那边去了。贾珍此时也无可奈何，只得看著二姐儿自去，剩下尤老娘和三姐儿相陪。那三姐儿虽向来也和贾珍偶有戏言，但不似他姐姐那样随和儿，所以贾珍虽有垂涎之意，却也不肯造次了，致讨没趣。况且尤老娘在旁边陪著，贾珍也不好意思太露轻薄。
paragraphs.english: At the moment, the four of them were drinking together. Jia Lian was afraid that he would come over at any moment and cause embarrassment, so he drank a few cups of wine and made an excuse to leave to the other side. Jia Zhen was helpless at this point and could only watch as Jia Lian's sister left, leaving behind Yu Laomang and Jia San'er. Although Jia San'er had always had occasional jokes with Jia Zhen, she was not as easy-going as her sister, so Jia Zhen, although he had a lustful desire, dared not be too bold, for fear of making a fool of himself. Moreover, with Yu Laomang accompanying, Jia Zhen was also not comfortable being too vulgar.
paragraphs.chinese: 当下四人一起喝酒。二姐儿此时恐怕贾琏一会儿过来，彼此尴尬，喝了几杯酒便找借口去了那边。贾珍此时也无可奈何，只能看着二姐儿自己离开，剩下尤老娘和三姐儿陪着。那三姐儿虽然向来也和贾珍偶尔有戏言，但不像她姐姐那样随和，所以贾珍虽然有垂涎之意，却也不敢太冒失，以免出洋相。况且尤老娘在旁边陪着，贾珍也不好意思太轻薄。

paragraphs.original: 却说跟的两个小厮，都在厨下和鲍二饮酒。那鲍二的女人多姑娘儿上灶。忽见两个丫头也走了来嘲笑，要吃酒，鲍二因说：“姐儿们不在上头伏侍，也偷著来了？一时叫起来没人，又是事。”他女人骂道：“糊涂浑呛了的忘八！你撞丧那黄汤罢。撞丧醉了，夹著你的脑袋挺你的尸去！叫不叫，与你什么相干？一应有我承当呢。风啊雨的，横竖淋不到你头上来。”
paragraphs.english:
Then, two servants were drinking in the kitchen with Bao Er. Bao Er's wife Daguang was on the stove cooking. Suddenly, two maids also secretly ran over to tease them and wanted to drink. Bao Er said, "Sisters are not upstairs serving, but they also came secretly? If they are caught, they will have to suffer." His wife scolded, "Dumb and stupid, you drunk yourself to death. If you are drunk and your head is stuck, you'll be carried off like a corpse. Whether they call or not, what does it matter to you? No matter if it's windy or rainy, it won't fall on your head."

Note that modern Putonghua is more concise and easier to understand, using modern Chinese grammar and vocabulary, avoiding complex classical Chinese vocabulary and sentence structure.
paragraphs.chinese:
接着，两个小厮在厨房里和鲍二喝酒。鲍二的女人多姑娘儿上灶做饭。忽然，两个丫头也偷偷跑来嘲笑他们，想要喝酒。鲍二因为说：“姐姐们不在上面侍奉，也偷偷来了？万一被发现没人，就要出事了。”他女人骂道：“糊涂浑呛了的忘八！你撞丧那黄汤罢。撞丧醉了，夹着你的脑袋挺你的尸去！叫不叫，与你有什么关系？不管刮风下雨，反正淋不到你头上。”

注意，现代普通话更加简洁、易懂，使用了现代汉语的语法和词汇，避免了繁复的文言词汇和语句。

paragraphs.original: 这鲍二原因妻子之力，在贾琏前十分有脸；近日他女人越发在二姐儿跟前殷勤伏侍，他便自己除赚钱吃酒之外，一概不管，一听他女人吩咐，百依百随。当下又吃了些，便去睡觉。这里他女人随著这些丫鬟小厮吃酒，又和那小厮们打牙撂嘴儿的玩笑，讨他们的喜欢，准备在贾珍前讨好儿。正在吃的高兴，忽听见扣门的声儿，鲍二的女人忙出来开门，看时，见是贾琏下马，问有事无事。鲍二女人便悄悄的告诉他说：”大爷在这里西院里呢。”
paragraphs.english: Bao Er, because of his wife's relationship, had great face in front of Jia Lian. Recently he wife was more devoted to serving at Er'er's home, so he didn't attend to anything, just followed his wife's orders. At present he drank a little wine and went to sleep. Here his wife followed these maids and servants to drink wine, and also joked with the boys to win their favor, in order to please Jia Zhen. When she was eating happily, suddenly she heard the knock on the door. Bao Er's wife hurriedly came out to open the door. She saw Jia Lian dismounting. She told him in a whisper, "Dad is in the west yard."
paragraphs.chinese: 鲍二因为妻子的关系，在贾琏面前很有面子。最近他妻子在二姐儿那里更加殷勤服侍，他就不管事了，只听从妻子的吩咐。当下他又喝了点酒，就去睡觉了。这里他妻子跟着这些丫鬟小厮喝酒，又和小厮们打牙咧嘴地开玩笑，讨他们的喜欢，准备在贾珍面前讨好。正在吃的高兴，忽然听见敲门声，鲍二的妻子急忙出来开门，一看是贾琏下马。她悄悄地告诉他说：“大爷在这里西院里呢。”

paragraphs.original: 贾琏听了，便至卧房，见尤二姐和两个小丫头在房中呢，见他来了，脸上却有些讪讪的。贾琏反推不知，只命：“快命酒来。咱们吃两杯好睡觉，我今日乏了。”二姐儿忙忙陪笑，接衣捧茶，问长问短，贾琏喜的心痒难受。一时，鲍二的女人端上酒来，二人对饮，两个小丫头在地下伏侍。
paragraphs.english: Jialin heard this and went to the bedroom. He found Youer and two maidservants there. On seeing him, Youer felt a little embarrassed. However, Jialin pretended not to notice and asked for wine to drink and go to sleep. He was tired today. Youer quickly smiled and took his clothes, poured tea, and asked after him. Jialin was itching to do something. After a while, Baoer's woman brought the wine and the two of them drank it. The two maidservants served them from below.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾琏听了，便到了卧房，见尤二姐和两个小丫头在房中。见到他，尤二姐有些尴尬。贾琏却装作不知，只命人拿酒来，两人喝两杯好睡觉，他今天累了。尤二姐赶忙陪笑，接衣服端茶，问长问短。贾琏心痒难耐。一会儿，鲍二的女人端来酒，两人对饮，两个小丫头在下面侍候。

paragraphs.original: 贾琏的心腹小童隆儿拴马去，瞧见有了一匹马，细瞧一瞧，知是贾珍的，心下会意，也来厨下。只见喜儿寿儿两个正在那里坐著吃酒，见他来了，也都会意，笑道：“你这会子来的巧。我们因赶不上爷的马，恐怕犯夜，往这里来借个地方睡一夜。”隆儿便笑道：“我是二爷使我送月银的。交给了奶奶，我也不回去了。”鲍二的女人便道：“偺们这里有的是炕，为什么大家不睡呢？”喜儿便说：“我们吃多了，你来吃一锺。”
paragraphs.english: Long Er, the heart of Jia Lian's servant, found Jia Zhen's horse when he was hitching up. He understood, and then came to the kitchen. Xi'er and Shou'er were drinking there, and when they saw him, they also understood. They laughed and said, "You came at the right time. We can't catch up with the master's horse, and we're afraid we'll be late, so we came here to find a place to sleep for the night." Long Er laughed and said, "I was sent by the second master to send the moon silver. I handed it over to the old lady and I'm not going back." Bao Er's woman said, "We have beds here, so why don't we all sleep together?" Xi'er said, "We've eaten too much, come and have a drink with us."
paragraphs.chinese: 贾琏的心腹小童隆儿拴马时，发现了贾珍的马。他看懂了，然后来到厨房。喜儿寿儿两个正在那里吃酒，看到他来了，也明白了。他们笑着说：“你来得正好。我们赶不上爷的马，怕晚了，来这里借个地方睡一晚。”隆儿笑着说：“我是二爷派我送月银的。交给了奶奶，我也不回去了。”鲍二的女人说：“我们这里有的是床，为什么大家不一起睡呢？”喜儿说：“我们吃多了，你来喝一杯吧。”

paragraphs.original: 隆儿才坐下，端起酒来，忽听马棚内闹将起来。原来二马同槽，不能相容，互蹄蹶起来。隆儿等慌的忙放下酒杯，出来喝住，另拴好了进来。鲍二的女人笑说：“好儿子们，就睡罢！我可去了。”三个拦著不肯叫走，又亲嘴摸乳，口里乱嘈了一回，才放他出去。
paragraphs.english: Longer sat down, picked up the wine cup, and suddenly heard the noise in the stable. It turned out that two horses were in the same trough, and they could not coexist, kicking each other with their hooves. Longer and others hurriedly put down their wine cups and ran out to stop them, and tied the horses again. Bao Er's wife laughed and said, "Good sons, go to sleep! I'm going first." The three sons held her back and kissed and touched her breasts, making a lot of noise in their mouths before letting her go.
paragraphs.chinese: 隆儿刚坐下，端起酒杯，忽然听到马棚里传来喧闹声。原来两只马儿同在一个槽里，无法共存，互相用蹄子踢了起来。隆儿等人赶紧放下酒杯，跑出去制止，重新拴好马匹。鲍二的女人笑着说：“好儿子们，就睡吧！我先走了。”三个儿子拦着不让她走，亲吻摸着她的乳房，嘴里乱吵了一阵，才让她出去。

paragraphs.original: 这里喜儿喝了几杯，已是楞子眼了。隆儿寿儿关了门，回头见喜儿直挺挺的躺在炕上，二人便推他说：“好兄弟，起来好生睡。只顾你一个人舒服，我们就苦了。”那喜儿便说道：“偺们今儿可要公公道道贴一炉子烧饼了！”隆儿寿儿见他醉了，也不理他，吹了灯，将就卧下。
paragraphs.english:
Here Xier drank a little wine and was already drunk. Longer and Shouer closed the door, turned back and saw Xier lying straight on the bed, so they pushed him: "Good brother, get up and sleep well. You are comfortable, and we are tired." Xier said: "We have to bake a batch of biscuits today!" Longer and Shouer saw that he was drunk and didn't care about him, blew out the lamp and went to bed.

（本翻译由小虫网论坛提供）

paragraphs.chinese: 尤二姐听到马叫，心里很不安，只能用言语干扰贾琏。贾琏喝了酒，心情激动，就命人收拾了酒菜，关上门，脱下衣服。二姐只穿著大红色的短袄，散著头发，满脸春光，比白天更俏丽。贾琏搂著她笑道：“人人都说我们那夜叉婆俊，如今我看来，给你拾鞋也不要！”二姐道：“我虽然长得好看，却没有品行，看来倒是不漂亮的。”贾琏忙说：“你怎么这么说？我不懂。”二姐流着泪说道：“你们把我当作糊涂人对待，什么事我不知道？我跟了你做了两个月的夫妻，日子虽然短，我也知道你不是糊涂人。我生是你的人，死是你的鬼！现在我们是夫妻，以后我全靠你了，我不敢隐瞒。我妹妹以后怎么办？据我看来，这个局面不是长久之计，要想出长久的解决办法才行！”贾琏听了，笑道：“你放心，我不是那种嫉妒吃醋的人。你知道的事情我也知道，你不用含糊。跟着我，大哥面前要规矩一点。我想，不如让三姨和大哥结婚，大家都好。你认为怎么样？”二姐擦擦眼泪说：“虽然你有这个好意，第一，三妹妹脾气不好；第二，怕大爷面子下不来。”贾琏说：“没关系。我先去，破例一下。”说着，乘着酒兴，进了西院。只见窗内灯火辉煌。贾琏便推门进去，说：“大爷在这里，我来请安。”

paragraphs.original: 贾珍听是贾琏的声音，吓了一跳，见贾琏进来，不觉羞惭满面。尤老娘也觉不好意思。贾琏笑道：“这有什么呢，偺们弟兄，从前是怎么样来？大哥为我操心，我粉身碎骨，感激不尽。大哥要多心，我倒不安了。从此，还求大哥照常才好；不然，兄弟宁可绝后，再不敢到此处来了。”说著，便要跪下。慌的贾珍连忙搀起来，只说：“兄弟怎么说，我无不领命。”贾琏忙命人：“看酒来，我和大哥吃两杯。”因又笑嘻嘻向三姐儿道：“三妹妹为什么不合大哥吃个双锺儿？我也敬一杯，给大哥合三妹妹道喜。”

paragraphs.original: 看官听说：这尤三姐天生脾气，和人异样诡僻。只因他的模样儿风流标致，他又偏爱打扮的出色，另式另样，做出许多万人不及的风情体态来。那些男子们，别说贾珍贾琏这样风流公子，便是一班老到人，铁石心肠，看见了这般光景，也要动心的。及至到他跟前，他那一种轻狂豪爽，目中无人的光景，早又把人的一团高兴逼住，不敢动手动脚。所以贾珍向来和二姐儿无所不至，渐渐的厌了，却一心注定在三姐儿身上，便把二姐儿乐得让给贾琏，自己却和三姐儿捏合。偏那三姐一般和他玩笑，别有一种令人不敢招惹的光景。他母亲和二姐儿也曾十分相劝，他反说：“姐姐糊涂！偺们金玉一般的人，白叫这两个现世宝沾污了去，也算无能！而且他家现放著个极利害的女人，如今瞒著，自然是好的；倘或一日他知道了，岂肯干休？势必有一场大闹。你二人不知谁生谁死，这如何便当作安身乐业的去处？”他母女听他这话，料著难劝，也只得罢了。

paragraphs.original: 贾琏来了，只在二姐屋里，心中也渐渐的悔上来了。无奈二姐儿倒是个多情的人，以为贾琏是终身之主了，凡事倒还知疼著热。要论温柔和顺，却较著凤姐还有些体度；就论起那标致来及言谈行事，也不减于凤姐。但已经失了脚，有了一个“淫”字，凭他什么好处也不算了。偏这贾琏又说：“谁人无错？知过必改就好。”故不提已往之淫，只取现今之善。便如胶似漆，一心一计，誓同生死，那里还有凤平二人在意了？

paragraphs.original: 兴儿笑嘻嘻的，在炕沿下，一头喝，一头将荣府之事备细告诉他母女。又说：“我是二门上该班的人。我们共是两班，一班四个，共是八个人。有几个知奶奶的心腹，有几个知爷的心腹。奶奶的心腹，我们不敢惹；爷的心腹，奶奶敢惹。提起来，我们奶奶的事，告诉不得奶奶，他心里歹毒，口里尖快。我们二爷也算是个好的，那里见的他！倒是跟前有个平姑娘，为人很好，虽然和奶奶一气，他倒背著奶奶常作些好事。我们有了不是，奶奶是容不过的，只求求他去就完了。如今合家大小，除了老太太、太太两个，没有不恨他的，只不过面子情儿怕他。皆因他一时看得人都不及他，只一味哄著老太太、太太两个人喜欢。他说一是一，说二是二，没人敢拦他。又恨不的把银子钱省下来，堆成山，好叫老太太、太太说他会过日子。殊不知苦了下人，他讨好儿。或有好事，他就不等别人去说，他先抓尖儿。或有不好的事，或他自己错了，他就一缩头，推到别人身上去，他还在旁边拨火儿。如今连他正经婆婆都嫌他，说他：‘“雀儿拣著旺处飞，黑母鸡一窝儿”’，自家的事不管，倒替人家去瞎张罗！要不是老太太在头里，早叫过他去了。”

We have two shifts, four people each, making a total of eight. Some of us know what the grandmother thinks, and some know what the master thinks. We can't provoke the grandmother's thoughts, but we can provoke the master's. Talk about our grandmother's things, we can't tell her. She is evil in her heart and sharp-tongued. Our second son is also a good person, but I haven't seen him. There is a Ping girl in front of her, who is very good. Although she is in the same group as the grandmother, she often does good things behind her back. We have made mistakes, and the grandmother can't tolerate them. Only ask her to go. Now, except for the old lady and the old lady, everyone in the family likes him, but they are afraid of his face. It's because the grandmother can't see his eyes and only likes to please the old lady and the old lady. He says one thing is one thing, and two things are two things, and no one dares to stop him. He hates to save the silverI don't know if he's been making trouble for the people he's supposed to be serving and trying to please other people. Or if there's something good happening, he'll go ahead and say it before anyone else gets a chance. Or if there's something bad or he's done something wrong, he'll hide away and blame it on someone else, even though he's the one who's to blame. Now even his own mother-in-law is getting sick of him, calling him a "black hen with a clutch of chicks". He can't even take care of his own affairs, and he's trying to meddle in other people's business. If it weren't for the old lady in front of him, he'd have been called over a long time ago.

Grandma is so polite and kind, how can she be his match?"
paragraphs.chinese: 尤二姐笑着说：“你这小滑头，还不起床！说句玩笑话，你就吓成这样了。你们为什么要来这儿？我还得去找你奶奶呢。”兴儿连忙摆手，说：“奶奶千万别去！我告诉你：一辈子别见到他才好！嘴甜心苦，两面三刀；表面上笑，脚下就使绊子；明是一盆火，暗是一把刀：他都占全了。只怕你三姨嘴还说不过他呢！奶奶这么斯文善良，哪里是他的对手？”

paragraphs.original: 二姐笑道：“我只以理待他，他敢怎么著我？”兴儿道：“不是小的喝了酒，放肆胡说。奶奶就是让著他，他看见奶奶比他标致，又比他得人心儿，他就肯善罢干休了？人家是醋罐子，他是醋缸，醋瓮！凡丫头们跟前，二爷多看一眼，他有本事当著爷打个烂羊头似的！虽然平姑娘在屋里，大约一年里头，两个有一次在一处，他还要嘴里掂十来个过儿呢。气的平姑娘性子上来，哭闹一阵，说：‘又不是我自己寻来的！你逼著我，我不愿，又说我反了。这会子又这么著！’他一般的也罢了，倒央及平姑娘。”
paragraphs.english: Erniang laughed and said, "I only deal with him with reason, how dare he bully me?" Xing'er said, "I'm not drunk, I'm not talking nonsense. Although Grandmother is tolerant towards him, but he sees that Grandmother is prettier than him, and is more liked by people, he will not give up? He's a vinegar jar, a vinegar barrel, a vinegar vat! In front of the girls, the second master will look at him, he has the ability to hit a rotten lamb head in front of the master! Although there is Pinggu in the room, but once a year, the two of them only have one chance to be together, he still looks for trouble in his mouth. He makes Pinggu angry and cries and complains, 'It's not that I found it myself! You're forcing me, I don't want to, you say I'm rebelling. This time you're making a fuss again!' Although Pinggu's temper is also big, but still begged Pinggu."
paragraphs.chinese: 二姐笑着说：“我只用道理对待他，他怎么敢欺负我？”兴儿道：“我不是喝了酒，胡说八道。奶奶虽然对他宽容，但他看见奶奶比他漂亮，又比他受人喜欢，他就不会善罢甘休？他是个醋坛子，是个醋缸，是个醋瓮！凡是丫头们面前，二爷多看一眼，他有本事当着爷打个烂羊头似的！虽然有平姑娘在屋里，但一年里头，两个人也只有一个机会在一起，他还要在嘴上找茬。气得平姑娘生气，哭闹一阵，说：‘又不是我自己找来的！你逼着我，我不愿意，又说我反了。这会子又这么闹！’虽然平姑娘脾气也大，但还是央求平姑娘。”

paragraphs.original: 二姐笑道：“可是撒谎？这么一个夜叉，怎么反怕屋里的人呢？”兴儿道：“就是俗语说的：‘三人抬不过个“理”字去’了。这平姑娘原是他自幼儿的丫头。陪过来一共四个，死的死，嫁的嫁，只剩下这个心爱的，收在房里。一则显他贤良，二则又拴爷的心。那平姑娘又是个正经人，从不会调三窝四的，倒一味忠心赤胆伏侍他：所以才容下了。”
paragraphs.english: Er Shao laughed and said, "Are you lying? How could a person like a night monster be afraid of the people at home?" Xing Er said, "That's what the saying goes: 'Three people cannot overcome the word "reason".' This Ping Gege is a little girl who has been a servant since she was young. There were originally four of them, but three of them died and the other was married. Only this one is the one he likes the most. He keeps her in his room to show his virtuous nature and to keep his heart. That Ping Gege is a very decent person. She never does anything to cause trouble. She is always loyal and devoted to him. That's why he keeps her."
paragraphs.chinese: 二姐笑道：“你是在撒谎吗？一个像夜叉一样的人，怎么会害怕家里的人呢？”兴儿道：“这是俗语说的：‘三人抬不过个“理”字去’了。这个平姑娘是自幼的丫头，陪过来一共四个，死的死，嫁的嫁，只剩下这个心爱的，收在房里。一来显他贤良，二来又拴住爷的心。那个平姑娘又是个正经人，从不会调三窝四的，倒一味忠心赤胆地服侍他：所以才容下了。”

paragraphs.original: 二姐笑道：“原来如此。但只我听见你们还有一位寡妇奶奶和几位姑娘，他这么利害，这些人肯依他吗？”兴儿拍手笑道：“原来奶奶不知道！我们家这位寡妇奶奶，第一个善德人，从不管事，只教姑娘们看书写字，针线道理，这是他的事情。前儿因为他病了，这大奶奶暂管了几天事，总是按著老例儿行，不像他那么多事逞才的。我们大姑娘，不用说，是好的了。二姑娘混名儿叫‘二木头’。三姑娘的混名儿叫‘玫瑰花儿’：又红又香，无人不爱，只是有刺扎手。可惜不是太太养的，‘老鸹窝里出凤凰’！四姑娘小，正经是珍大爷的亲妹子，太太抱过来的，养了这么大，也是一位不管事的。奶奶不知道，我们家的姑娘们不算外，还有两位姑娘，真是天下少有！一位是我们姑太太的女儿，姓林；一位是姨太太的女儿，姓薛。这两位姑娘都是美人一般的呢，又都知书识字的。或出门上车，或在园子里遇见，我们连气儿也不敢出。”尤二姐笑道：“你们家规矩大，小孩子进的去，遇见姑娘们，原该远远的藏躲著，敢出什么气儿呢？”兴儿摇手，道：“不是那么不敢出气儿。是怕这气儿大了，吹倒了林姑娘；气儿暖了，又吹化了薛姑娘！”说得满屋里都笑了。
